TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InheritedExportAttribute extends System.ComponentModel.Composition.ExportAttribute

Docs.summary: Specifies that a type provides a particular export, and that subclasses of that type will also provide that export.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
The default contract name is the result of calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName(System.Type)?displayProperty=nameWithType> on the type itself that is marked with this attribute.
The contract name is compared using a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison using <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified contract name.

remarks.format:
The default contract name is the result of calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName(System.Type)?displayProperty=nameWithType> on the type itself that this is marked with this attribute.
The contract name is compared using a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison using <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified contract type.

remarks.format:
The contract name is the result of calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName(System.Type)?displayProperty=nameWithType> on `contractType`.
The default contract name is the result of calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName(System.Type)?displayProperty=nameWithType> on the type itself that is marked with this attribute.
The contract name is compared using a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison using <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified contract name and type.

remarks.format:
The default contract name is the result of calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName(System.Type)?displayProperty=nameWithType> on the type itself that this is marked with this attribute.
The contract name is compared using a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison using <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
